document_data.name: Charm undead
document_data.mainbody: '''''Charm undead''''' was an [[enchantment]]/[[necromancy]] [[spell]] that allowed the user limited control over [[undead]] creatures.
document_data.Effects: The spell worked in a similar manner to ''[[charm monster]]'', but only affected the undead, even though that were typically immune to ''[[charm]]'' spells and effects.
document_data.Casting: The casting of this spell required [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components.
